pages.title: Champion's Call
pages.text: $(o)During the time of the Ancients, the Aether flew above the Overworld. One day, a powerful demon challenged the Aetherian king to a battle. The ensuing duel was too much for the Aether, and it fell down back to the Overworld. The Champion lies deep in the Nether, awaiting her next challenge.$()
HINT: A Cartographer in the Nether may be useful.
